mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (buyer_id, seller_id, product_id) VALUES (#{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.buyer_id AS buyerId, r.seller_id AS sellerId, r.product_id AS productId, r.last_message AS lastMessage, r.last_message_time AS lastMessageTime, p.title AS productTitle, (SELECT u.userid FROM user u WHERE u.id = CASE WHEN r.buyer_id = #{userId} THEN r.seller_id ELSE r.buyer_id END) AS targetNick FROM chat_room r JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.buyer_id = #{userId} OR r.seller_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.last_message_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender_id, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{message}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT m.msg_id AS messageId, m.room_id AS roomId, m.sender_id AS senderId, u.name AS senderNick, m.message, m.created_at AS sendTime FROM chat_message m JOIN user u ON m.sender_id = u.id WHERE m.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY m.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_room SET last_message = #{message}, last_message_time = NOW() WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
